pins.title: Power Outages in Ukraine After Russian Strikes
pins.one_liner: Over a million Ukrainians lose power as Russia pounds grid, highlighting Moscow's renewed winter offensive against the country's energy system.

pins.title: Mark Six Lottery Jackpot Winner
pins.location_label: 香港 Hong Kong, 中国
pins.one_liner: A half-share of the first prize was won in Hong Kong's Mark Six draw, delivering a payout of HK$8,000,000.

pins.title: Cambodia-Thailand Flights Unaffected by Border Clashes
pins.one_liner: Commercial air links between Cambodia and Thailand remain on schedule despite renewed fighting along the land border.

pins.title: Bipartisan Bill to Strengthen Public Safety in Indian Country Passes Senate
pins.one_liner: A bipartisan bill aimed at strengthening public safety in Indian Country unanimously passed the U.S. Senate.

pins.title: The Block Collects 2025 at Block Museum of Art
pins.location_label: Block Museum of Art, Evanston, IL
pins.one_liner: The Block Museum of Art hosts 'The Block Collects 2025', featuring works selected by students, including pieces by Chitra Ganesh.

pins.title: Holidays at Skydeck!
pins.one_liner: Guests can enjoy holiday-themed activities at Skydeck, including a holiday-themed L train replica, live music, and festive Pilates and yoga classes with Santa.

pins.title: Congress Rally in Delhi Over 'Vote Chori'
pins.one_liner: The Congress party will hold a rally at Ramlila Maidan in Delhi to protest against alleged 'vote chori'.

pins.title: Honolulu Marathon
pins.one_liner: The Honolulu Marathon takes place, featuring a 26.2-mile race in paradise.

pins.title: Jurong West Bus Accident
pins.location_label: Jurong West Avenue 1, near Block 425, Singapore
pins.one_liner: Two double-decker buses collided on Jurong West Avenue 1, resulting in 44 people being sent to the hospital.

pins.title: Singapore Cat Festival 2025
pins.location_label: Suntec Singapore Convention & Exhibition Centre, Singapore
pins.one_liner: The Singapore Cat Festival brings together cat owners, lovers, and enthusiasts with local cat product vendors and activities.

pins.title: Christmas Wonderland at Gardens by the Bay
pins.one_liner: Christmas Wonderland brings festive cheer to Gardens by the Bay with light displays and entertainment.

pins.title: Flash Flood Risk in Western Singapore
pins.one_liner: PUB issued a flash flood risk warning for four locations in western Singapore due to heavy rain.

pins.title: Singapore Government Cash Payout
pins.one_liner: The Singapore government announced a one-time cash payment of up to S$1300 for eligible citizens to help with rising living costs.

pins.title: Singapore Signs Pax Silica Declaration
pins.one_liner: Singapore signed the US-led Pax Silica Declaration on AI, global tech supply chains, and infrastructure.

pins.title: Singapore signs US-led Pax Silica Declaration on AI
pins.one_liner: Singapore and six other countries signed the Pax Silica Declaration in Washington D.C. to collaborate on AI, tech supply chains, and infrastructure.

pins.title: Officer Cadet Commissioning Parade at SAFTI Military Institute
pins.one_liner: 405 cadets were commissioned as Singapore Armed Forces (SAF) officers at the SAFTI Military Institute.

pins.title: Maritime Support Package
pins.one_liner: The Maritime and Port Authority of Singapore (MPA) announced the MaritimeSG Together Package, providing financial support to the maritime industry.

pins.title: Gardens by the Bay Events
pins.one_liner: Gardens by the Bay hosts various events, including a Peranakan tile design activity and Christmas Wonderland.
